name: 服務業經營與策略
description: This case course explores the dimensions of successful service firms. It prepares students for enlightened management and suggests creative entrepreneurial opportunities. Service actions are based on totally different assumptions about the way success is achieved.  The results show not only in terms of conventional measures of performance but also in the enthusiasm of the employees and quality of customer satisfaction.  Beginning with the service encounter, service managers must blend marketing, technology, people, and information to achieve a distinctive competitive advantage. Because the service sector is the fastest-growing sector of the economy, this course is intended to help students discover entrepreneurial opportunities.
goals: 透過個案學習成功服務企業的運作方式
透過服務達成組織內部與外部客戶滿意度
熟悉服務創新與成長方式
了解服務業的創業機會

methodologies.note: 講述服務產業特性與運作
以哈佛個案為基礎討論環境、策略、功能政策與組織結構與執行問題。以參與者為中心的教學方法。學生必須於上課前小組討論，上課時聆聽老師問題，同學回答，教師利用問答方式引導學生思考，比較與整合多元意見，分析與抽象化課堂討論內容的結果。
參訪物流中心；連鎖餐廳；百貨服務業等

grading.note: 個案討論問答部分由教師抽學生作答(同時計算出席情況)或由學生舉手參與討論
分組企劃兩次企業參訪活動
